    • Method Detail

      • getAccuracy

        public double getAccuracy()
        Returns the total number of errors.
        Returns:
        Number of errors = sum of off-diagonal entries in confusion matrix.

      • getF1

        public double getF1()
        Returns the overall F1, computed as the weighted average of the per-class F1 scores. The weights are determined by the true label distribution.
        Returns:
        Overall F1

      • getF1

        public double getF1(int label)
        Returns the per-class F1.
        Parameters:
        label - Index of the label (i.e., class).
        Returns:

      • getPrecision

        public double getPrecision(int label)
        Returns the per-class precision. Let CM denote the confusion matrix. Let TP = CM[label][label]. Let FP = sum_{i != label} CM[i][label]. Per-class precision = TP / (TP + FP).
        Parameters:
        label -
        Returns:

      • getRecall

        public double getRecall(int label)
        Returns the per-class recall. Let CM denote the confusion matrix. Let TP = CM[label][label]. Let FN = sum_{j != label} CM[label][j]. Per-class precision = TP / (TP + FN).
        Parameters:
        label -
        Returns:

      • getConfusionMatrix

        public ConfusionMatrix getConfusionMatrix()
        Returns a clone (deep copy) of the confusion matrix.
        Returns:
